DataElement.preferredName: Refractory Disease Patient Diagnostic Radiology Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator for the question asking if patient with refractory disease has certain type of radiographic findings.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Refractory Disease Patient Diagnostic Radiology Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A disease that resists treatment._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The branch of radiology concerned with the use of ionizing or nonionizing radiation for diagnostic purposes._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease that resists treatment.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Diagnostic Radiology Finding Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The branch of radiology concerned with the use of ionizing or nonionizing radiation for diagnostic purposes.:Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The branch of radiology concerned with the use of ionizing or nonionizing radiation for diagnostic purposes.
Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient have resistant/r
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have resistant/refractory soft tissue disease that is not MIBG avid or does not demonstrate increased FDG uptake on PET scan?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for ANBL1821 - done as generic CDE b/c definition including MIBG/PET details was too long and DEC was not being validated.
